surfaceDistance.description: Module used to iteratively created a stable surface distance for every particle in the simulation. Very slow.
surfaceDistance.name: distance

surfaceDetection.description: Module used to iteratively created a stable surface distance for every particle in the simulation. Very slow.
surfaceDetection.name: detection

surfaceDistance.name: Used to enable/disable surface distance calculations, required for adaptivity.

surfaceDetection.name: Used to enable/disable surface distance calculations, required for adaptivity.

level_limit.name: Maximum distance to the surface that is calculate by the surface distance function. Should be atleast -20.f or smaller.

neighborLimit.name: Particles with more than this number of neighbors will be marked as interior particles. Useful value: 40.

phi_min.name: Value that stores the closest distance of a fluid particle to the surface.

phi_change.name: Value that stores the number of particles changed in the last distance iteration.

distanceFieldDistances.name: Particles closer than this distance to a boundary will be marked as interior particles to avoid instabilities due to bad boundary handling. Useful value: 4.f,4.f,4.f.

surfaceIterations.name: Particles closer than this distance to a boundary will be marked as interior particles to avoid instabilities due to bad boundary handling. Useful value: 4.f,4.f,4.f.
